card_name: Gaia Blaze, the Force of the Sun
card_text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$NIf this attacking card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: It can make a second attack in a row. Once per turn, at the end of the Battle Phase: You can target FIRE monsters in your GY up to the number of monsters this card destroyed by battle this turn; add them to your hand.
